S4.T1.caption: Table 1: Comparison between existing works on FL. We denote Cryptographic Methods as CM, Differential Privacy as DP, Linear Models as LM, Neural Networks as NN, and Decision Tree as DT.

references: Different algorithms or methods are leveraged by different practitioners to construct one or multiple types of FL architectures such as Linear Models (LM), Decision Trees (DT) and Neural Network (NN), etc. Apparently, most FL settings have horizontal data partitioning. Table 1 summarizes several popular researches.
